sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Coin = ({ name, image, symbol, price, volume, priceChange, marketcap }) => { return (

{name}

{symbol}

${price.toLocaleString()}

${volume.toLocaleString()}

{priceChange < 0 ? (

{priceChange.toFixed(2)}%

) : (

{priceChange.toFixed(2)}%

)}

Mkt Cap: ${marketcap.toLocaleString()}

) } export default Coin
